description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 20/03530/FUL:  finished floor levels (6), construction management plan (26) and means of access to Blocks A and B (41) in respect of construction of four buildings, ranging from 3 to 5 storeys in height to provide 29 residential units, including underground basement parking, new vehicular access, landscaping and associated works.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The information submitted is insufficient and unsatisfactory, such that condition 26 is not approved. The dust mitigation measures specified in the submitted Construction Management Plan are not satisfactory, there is no evidence of membership of the Considerate Contractors Scheme and no details have been provided regarding the installation of a heavy-duty crossover. The tie-in details for Carrs Lane entrance with the public highway are required and an appropriate photographic condition survey of the area is missing.   As the construction management plan is not acceptable, the submitted details therefore fail to comply with policies CP24, CP25, CP30 and CP32 of the Core Strategy (2010), policies DMD47, DMD48, DMD64 and DMD65 of the Development Management Document (2014), policy SI1 of the London Plan (2021) and with the Mayor of London's SPG on 'The Control of Dust and Emissions During Construction & Demolition'.
